text: Alquines is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in northern France. ==Geography== A town located 18 miles (29 km) east of Boulogne-sur-Mer, at the junction of the D216 with the D191 road, by the banks of the Hem river. ==Population== ==Sights== * The sixteenth century church. * Remains of a feudal motte. * The Chapel de Fromentel. * The war memorial. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * Alquines war memorial Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Alquines
